title: "Migrating feature_columns to TF2's Keras Preprocessing Layers"
excerpt: "Training a model will usually come with some amount of feature preprocessing, particularly when dealing with structured data. When training a tf.estimator.Estimator in TF1, this feature preprocessing is usually done with the tf.feature_column API."
